Detailed Description

Helper class for indexing the values of a discrete/discretized variable conjunction.

Member Function Documentation

bool plVariableIndexer::get_index_from_value ( const plValues &  value,
unsigned int &  index 
) const

Get the index corresponding to a given value in the output parameter 'index'.

Returns 'true' if the value is in the range.

template<typename vectorT >
bool plVariableIndexer::get_index_from_value ( const std::vector< vectorT > &  value,
unsigned int &  index 
) const

Get the index corresponding to a given value in the output parameter 'index'.

Returns 'true' if the value is in the range. This template method is instantiated for 'int', 'unsigned int', 'float', 'double', and 'long double'.
